class.rdfs:comment: A structured value providing information about when a certain organization or person owned a certain product.
class.rdfs:label: OwnershipInfo

schema:acquiredFrom.rdfs:comment: The organization or person from which the product was acquired.
schema:acquiredFrom.rdfs:label: acquiredFrom

schema:ownedFrom.rdfs:comment: The date and time of obtaining the product.
schema:ownedFrom.rdfs:label: ownedFrom

schema:ownedThrough.rdfs:comment: The date and time of giving up ownership on the product.
schema:ownedThrough.rdfs:label: ownedThrough

schema:typeOfGood.rdfs:comment: The product that this structured value is referring to.
schema:typeOfGood.rdfs:label: typeOfGood
